trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered collection of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 表示的有序的集合<xref:System.Double>值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: collectionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref:System.Double> values the collection is initially capable of storing.

trans-unit.target: 数<xref:System.Double>集合是最初可存储的值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref:System.Double> to the end of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref:System.Double>到末尾<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the end of this collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到此集合的末尾的项。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the items from this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从这中移除所有项<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会更改的<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection>容量

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"> </xref>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

trans-unit.source: The number of doubles contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回可循环访问集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器只允许读取集合中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中的第一项之前。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置，调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>到集合，然后再读取<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>的值的第一项枚举器向前移动</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>返回相同的对象之前<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>至下一项。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举数传递到集合的末尾之后，将放后的最后一项在集合中，且调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，则调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>到再次，集合的第一项可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>后, 跟<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改到集合，如添加、 修改或删除项，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>到

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>将返回到，设置的项，即使枚举数已经无效。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合; 独占访问权因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator>可以循环访问集合。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection.Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的典型实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，此实现引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果你尝试插入**null** (**执行任何操作**) 引用。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
